extendedInfo.description: The First Judicial District of Pennsylvania and its Department of Information and Technology are pleased to announce the rollout of an App that can be downloaded on Android Phones and Tablets. The App displays the hearing lists for the Trial Division - Civil as well as the docket entries for the listed cases. With the touch of a button, users can see up-to-the-minute listings and filings.Look for more Philadelphia Court Apps in the near future!

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Im from Philadelphia and I give this app 5 stars bcause now I can look up court dates without calling the courthouse.
reviews.author: A Google User
